title: Find User-Generated Content During a Breaking News Event
description: During a breaking news event, a social media editor searches for photos and videos posted by eyewitnesses on social media.

tasks.description: Search social media platforms using relevant keywords and location tags for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a stream of posts from the event location.

tasks.description: Identify the most compelling and credible-looking photos and videos.
tasks.expected_outcome: A selection of potential user-generated content is made.

tasks.description: Contact the original posters to ask for permission to use their content with credit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent secures the rights to use the content.
